text:
Hey everyone :wave: There’s a company that puts out a yearly comprehensive review of the best faucet brands. They have great info, but it’s badly written, dense and the site UI makes it very hard to read.

Is there anything wrong legally/ethically with me writing a blog post with a summary of the main points from their review and links to the products that we sell from those recommended brands? (The company doesn’t sell faucets and I’d of course link back to the original reviewer’s post and credit them)
